questions.question: What is the primary characteristic that distinguishes Machine Learning from traditional programming?
questions.answer: Machine Learning allows the system to learn from data without being explicitly programmed.

questions.question: What are the two main types of learning in machine learning when data has labeled outputs versus unlabeled outputs?
What is a feature in the context of machine learning?
questions.answer: A feature is an individual measurable property or characteristic of a phenomenon being observed.

questions.question: What is a Neural Network primarily composed of?
questions.answer: It is composed of interconnected nodes or neurons organized in layers.
